text: (Uko twaguhishuriye mbere, yewe Muhamadi) ni nako twaguhishuriye Qur’an iri mu rurimi rw’Icyarabu, kugira ngo uburire abatuye Umul Qura(Maka) n’abari mu nkengero zayo, kandi unaburire (abantu ibihano by’) umunsi w’ikoraniro udashidikanywaho. Ubwo itsinda rimwe rizaba riri mu ijuru, irindi riri mu muriro ugurumana
